I reached out to the Wellbots service people to ask what's the status of my product. On Jan9th, I got a response that the item is on backorder, asking me if I want to stay on the backorder list. I replied the same day, saying that if you can deliver this item before Jan16th, then put me on that list. So far, I've not heard back from the team. Today I received an email saying the order has been shipped through USPS. I checked USPS tracking, they haven't received it yet from a 'Shipping Partner'. So far, I don't know yet whether I'll be able to get the item before I leave for my vacation.

Review.Titre: WARNING Ecoflow combos do not ship complete!
Review.Contenu: Before finally deciding on buying another power station from Wellbots I recieved a call from an individual at Welbots, asking if I had any questionsHe saw I was shopping for another power station and wanted to know if I had any questions. I explained that I was interested in the Combo deal being offered for the Delta 2 with 160 watt solar panels. I told him that my concern about making another purchase from Wellbots was that my first order (Delta 2 Max with 2 160watt solar panels) did not include any connector cables. My first order was delivered to my home address in Minnesota and required me to order the correct cables on Amazon. He assured me this was a complete combo with everything needed was included and the first order was a mistake. He said he would send an inquiry to Ecoflow and have something sent out to my home in Minnesota to complete my first order. Based on this, I ordered the Delta 2 with with a 160watt solar panel, and once again I didn't get anything to connect the solar panel. This was delivered to my work site in Washington State.I'm frustrated, had I just been told it wasn't included I could have easily ordered the required cables at time of purchase. Fool me once... shame on you!Fool me twice... shame on me! The frustrating part of all this, is I'm being forced to write an email, because when I called and asked to talk to the same individual (withholding his name) regarding my frustration, I was told I have to send an email to get help.So, this is the actual copy of my email to them, I'm just posting on review sites to help others from the same frustration. Very Frustrating!

Seems awfully fishy to me. Seems more like there was never a package to begin with. In conclusion, i would avoid making an order from this company at all costs. I'm so pissed off right now! Review.Titre: 0 out of 10
Review.Contenu: Made a purchase for a housewarming gift and it never arrived. I called promptly to ask for help resolving the issue and immediately the excuses began on how it was not their problem and finger pointing began at everyone else. I was told I should open a case against my credit card and let them pay for the missing product and they would send me the case number 'in a few moments' that they would open with FedEx. Not surprising after 24 hours the email with the case number never arrived I had to track down and hound customer service for this number. I spoke to FedEx who alerted me that this should be Wellbots issue to resolve and when I reached back out to Wellbots they have gone radio silent. This is exactly what I knew would happen. I want my product refunded and to regain the trust in this company so I can make future purchases but it is becoming increasingly more difficult with every single passing day with no resolution to my problem.Good customer service requires communication and resolve this has been neither.

Review.Titre: Horrible customer service
Review.Contenu: I had a horrible experience with Wellbots. I bought a Segway nine bot for my son for Christmas. It arrived with a damaged sensor that prevented it from going full speed. Segway said it needed to be replaced and to contact the vendor I bought it from. I emailed Wellbots support multiple times with no answer.  Days later I called. They answered quickly but seemed to be beholden to their 3rd party warehouse to send me a return label. I waited a week and got nothing. I called again, same issue. I waited another week.  Same issue, I called again and days later I got a return label in my email.  I returned the Segway and then got an email saying they received it and were going to try and fix it to send it back. I responded angrily that I didn't want it fixed, it was delivered with an issue, I wanted a new one. They never responded to my email, but did eventually send a new one. But all in all it took me over 2 months to get what I ordered in mid December.

Review.Titre: NEVER again!!  Wellbots SUCKS!!
Review.Contenu: I bought a drone from wellbots.  It did not say it was back ordered.  They charged my card immediately.  I expected it to be shipped right away, as I needed it quickly.After several days, it still showed as "preparing for shipment."  I called Wellbots, and they said their warehouse didn't notify them that they were out of stock, but that it would be shipping the following Wednesday.Then I got an email from them stating that they got more in over the weekend, and it would be shipping on Monday.So I checked on Tuesday, and it still showed as "preparing for shipping."I called them and they again told me that they didn't get them in, and that it would not ship until the end of the following week.They offered me a stupid 20% off coupon for some accessory.I needed the drone!!Because of them, I missed out on the most epic conditions in 3 years.  Thanks Wellbots.Never again.I'm tempted to sue them.

Review.Titre: No thanks
Review.Contenu: No communication

Review.Titre: Jury is still out...
Review.Contenu: Order #110338.So the jury is still out.  My initial experience with the sales team over the phone was great!  The gentleman (I forget his name) that helped me was very helpful, patient, and walked me through all of my questions.  The pricing and free delivery to my doorstep were the best deal I could find anywhere online so I ended up ordering two (2) MotoTec Mud Monster XL go-karts as Christmas presents for my kids. I was told there were only four (4) left in stock but that my order of two (2) would arrive in time for Christmas.  This order took place right before Thanksgiving.About a day or two later I received email confirmation for the order of two (2) Mototec go-karts and a few days after that, I received the shipping information.  Everything seemed to be moving along as I had been told by the sales team.Two weeks or so after that I was contacted by the delivery company and made arrangements to have them delivered to my house (plenty of time before Christmas).  However, when I got home from work that day, I only saw one (1) go-kart delivery and when I checked the bill of lading, it only showed a shipment for one (1) go-kart.  I contacted the delivery company and they confirmed they only received one (1) go-kart from Wellbots. I called Wellbots the next day and spoke to a representative (Alex, who was helpful and courteous) who looked into the discrepancy for me.  The following day, he called me and let me know there was only one (1) available go-kart when I made my purchase and that the next batch of go-karts was not expected by Wellbots until the end of December.  He apologized and asked if I ever received an email from Wellbots indicating I would only be receiving one (1) go-kart after all and I let him know I did not.  Again, he apologized, explained they have been experiencing some "bugs" in their system, and offered a small discount ($20.00) for the "miscommunication."  He also offered to refund the difference of one (1) go-kart if I opted not to keep the order in place.Alex later recontacted me and advised the next shipment of go-karts were likely not going to arrive in the Wellbots warehouse until early January.  Despite being treated by helpful and friendly staff whenever I've been in contact with Wellbots, my over all experience has not been great.  I specifically called in the order over the phone to make sure there were no mistakes in the order and ordered them early to make sure they would arrive before Christmas.  Now, both a significant mistake has occurred, resulting in the fact that only one will be here on time for Christmas.  Thus, the jury is still out.  As of this writing I am waiting to hear if Wellbots has some way, other than a $20.00 discount on a $1,500.00 purchase to try to make this right.  I will update this review accordingly once this gets resolved.

Review.Titre: I ordered my the Zendure SuperTank Pro…
Review.Contenu: I ordered my the Zendure SuperTank Pro on 23 December 2022 because it was recommended on The Vege website and it was the best price I could find.  I understand the Holidays may affect the shipment, so I waited to contact Wellbots.  On 29 December 2022 , when I did not get a shipping email, I sent an email to the support address in the confirmation email I received.  I did not get a response to the support email.  On 7 January 2023, to my surprise, I received the SuperTank Pro.  On 8 January 2023, I received an email saying my order was on the way - AFTER I received the SuperTank Pro!  The communication from Wellbots was not good.  While I received the SuperTank Pro, it would have been good to know when to expect the package.  Wellbots needs to communicate with its customers better.  I would not have minded a delay if I was informed about it.  Based on this experience, I will probably order from some place else even if Wellbots has the lowest price.

Review.Contenu: Several minutes after placing my order, I asked via Live Chat to change the chosen color of the item I ordered, and I only got a response many hours later. They said they would make the change to order. The next day, I checked the order details to notice nothing changed, so I emailed to remind them. However, I didn't receive a confirmation email and tracking number; the order still reads "You’ll receive an email when your order is ready."Wellbots's customer service is full of lies. Their live chat window boasts of "typically reply within minutes." My experience is that they typically ignore you and occasionally reply after half a day. Avoid Wellbots. Eventually, the meager discount you get from Wellbots comes at a huge emotional cost.Update: The order was delivered within 1 week, as advertised by the retailer; and they gave me the color that I wanted. It was still not a satisfactory experience because I had never received an email confirming the shipping of my order. To date, my order status still reads "Your order is confirmed. You’ll receive an email when your order is ready." Not only did their system malfunction, but also their customer service. They did not provide me with correct information with regard to my order.I thus changed my rating to 3 stars.

The team was dedicated to help me after some time and were responsive and following up every day.

Review.Titre: Ordered a dolphin pool caddy
Review.Contenu: Ordered a dolphin pool caddy. Took over 2 weeks for delivery . Guess I’m just used to quicker delivery from other sources

Review.Titre: Fail on Customer Service Chat Response!
Review.Contenu: I purchased (2) Ecoflow Smart Panels (about $3000). Wanted to buy some extra relays from them to use in the panels. Tried to use chat. They were unavailable. So, I left a message with a very "specific request."Instead of responding to the "specific request," I get a generic sales email saying, "Happy to see you are interested in the "Ecoflow Smart Home Panel" only...we only have a few left in stock, please shop now here....Obviously, they don't read your chat messages. I responded to their email asking them to answer the question I originally asked. Of course, as expected, no answer.You'd think after spending $3000+, it would garner a little better customer service response than a bot response!Follow up:  I finally did get a response (several days later). They didn't carry the extra relays for the EcoFlow Panel. My feeling is still the same, if you don't have anyone to man the chat live, or you're not going to respond to it, don't have it on your website!

Review.Titre: Easy website to maneuver.
Review.Contenu: Easy website to maneuver.Probably could use better description of what pumps the pool cleaner works best with instead of size of pool would be helpful. Satisfied with my purchase.

Review.Titre: I wanted to like this tool better
Review.Contenu: I wanted to like this tool better, but it just doesn't perform as expected. It doesn't seem to respond to the remote at all. I can live with that though. It also takes a lot of babysitting. It gets stuck between my kitchen mats an cabinets. It spend most of its battery trying to get out from under the table and all the chair legs. So I move two of the chairs and move the stools at the counter to give it a fighting chance. I knew our house would be a challenge, we live on a heavily treed farm with two hairy dogs that are free to go in and out. Lots of dirt, nettles and twigs Wellbots little container fills up pretty fast. I usually have to empty it during a run.  It just seems like another chore vs a help. I do think my house is an extreme expectation though, and many people I work with that live 'city lives' love theirs. I would give it one star for my satisfaction, but given the extreme circumstance, it deserved a little break in judgement.

Review.Titre: Slow processing order. Slow shipping.
Review.Contenu: Update: They sent a $10 refund to make up for lag time. At least tried to address the issue, which is about all you can ask these days! Original: Haven't even received item yet but won't shop here again. Ordered on a Tues..said 2-3 days processing. Thursday I was inquiring status..hadn't shipped. Friday still nothing, and - they didn't answer live chat or email so now i had to wait the weekend. Monday still nothing. Finally called and got a human, which was great (but hard to understand). There was a "delay" but they'd get it shipped today (no notification of this delay was provided). I asked if they could expedite shipping she said she couldn't or it would be a big extra charge. I asked if it could be waived since there was a delay on their side..she said she would check and get back to me..and never did. Shortly after it was shipped via snail speed ground and isn't expected until Friday night (another 4 days). I understand it's not Amazon, but if you want to compete with them (all for it) you are going to have to find a way to do a little better than 10 days when people are used to next day arrival (if it arrives on time).

Review.Titre: Easy to purchase and fast shipping

Review.Titre: My trike
Review.Contenu: My husband, who is very handy, was able to assemble the unit in about an hour.  The user manual was not as informative as it could be.We charged it over night and took it to the mall the next day to test it out.  My 14 yo granddaughter  unloaded it from my car. I unfolded it easily. And off we went...It was very easy to operate.  I have to say it was too fast for me on level 1 full. I had to put it back to as low as it could go.  I would suggest a slower speed or 2 than what it has now. The basket and bag are both very handy.  Not to crazy about having to fold up the basket before we can fold up the trike. I will be recommending this trike to everyone.  Family and friends!Please improve the user manual. Thanks!!

Review.Titre: Great expereience except no notification of signing for package
Review.Contenu: Helpful website, good price, quick shipment, and good packaging. Didn't tell me I had to sign for package, so delivery was delayed 2 days, but otherwise delivery time and transaction in general was great!

Review.Titre: I was extremely not satisfied with…Bryan
Review.Contenu: Updated on 01/17/2023: Wellbots customer service reached out to me and issued a full refund.As of now I received the solution I was seeking (even though it took many efforts in several months), I decide to update my review rating.-------------------------I was extremely not satisfied with wellbots at many levels. 1. The worst must be their customer service. They said many things during the support but did many things different. One example, the customer support, Bryan said he would let me return the "late arrival" bike FREE but next day, he asked me to pay a high shipping fee to return it. 2. The next thing I don't like is that they are not reliable and didn't give me a good trust. They promised to deliver it on a given day I planned for my trip, but more than 2 weeks later the item arrived. The item arrived late and I had the bike unused. They blamed on their logistic for delaying it. Well, I buy an item from you, you promised to deliver it on a given day. If you couldn't do that, do not put the promised date on the order. Also a delay from your logistic is a delay done by you because they partnered with you for this business. 3. When I kept seeing the routing of my order kept changing on the tracking number, I contacted their customer service. Instead of them contact the logistic, they asked me to go around, make phone calls to track it. This is not right. 4. Another example of their bad customer service. Brian said he talked to his manager and got approved for a free return and would come back with a return label. Well he never returned with such label. I read a few bad reviews about wellbots, but I didn't trust those reviews. That was bad on my part, but then wellbots proved me how right other customers were. Never again. People please be aware of wellbots and their business.

Review.Titre: Honestly I didn’t have this kickscooter…

I like the range though and I would recommend this to a friend especially if their commute is too long to walk but too short for a car.

Review.Titre: We are excited!
Review.Contenu: Fast shipping! Smooth transaction. Great product.We just received our Delta 1300 and it seems to be doing what it’s supposed to. We even got to use a coupon! We are excited! Thanks Wellbots!

Review.Titre: I got a great deal however...
Review.Contenu: I got a great deal, great product, but Wellbots distribution never sent a tracking number until after I received my package. Spending $899 with a company I have not shopped with before can be a little uncomfortable. I got a great deal, however I emailed after the 4th day of purchase, never received a tracking and on the 5th day I received the item. The following day (I believe) I received a tracking number and an update that the package was delivered.

Review.Titre: This review would be 5 stars, but…
Review.Contenu: This review would be 5 stars, but my item showed up slightly flawed. Nothing that effects it’s performance, but not what you want when spending that amount of money on a new item. It’s not enough to want to pack it up and return it though. There’s is a mark on the side of the scooter that was very visible when unpacking. Probably happened during transport. The scooter itself is amazing and I’d recommend it to anyone. Rides smooth, good power to get up hills, easy to set up, and looks sleek! Wellbots has the best price on the scooter compared to everywhere else, and free shipping is a huge plus!

Review.Titre: My first order from Wellbots
Review.Contenu: My first order from Wellbots.  I paid $160 for 2nd day delivery, and after waiting 2 full days with no delivery or tracking number I was disappointed to find out that order had not been shipped from the manufacturer.  I expressed my disappointment and then Wellbots customer service kicked into high gear— I quickly received a tracking number, and after two more days my order arrived AND I was refunded the expedited delivery charge of $160.  So, although Wellbots dropped the ball initially, Customer Service did an excellent job of salvaging my first order experience.  I would love to know why the order was initially mis-handled.

Review.Titre: Just received my order a few days ago…
Review.Contenu: Just received my order a few days ago an have only used it once , they have fast shipping and it was exactly what I ordered , time will tell on the longevity of the product ..  only gave 4 stars because there is always room for better service…..

Review.Contenu: Great price on an electric scooter with a discount code.  Ordered it Sunday and got a shipping update on Wednesday.  I think that could be shortened a little to improve purchase experience.

Review.Titre: Great Customer Service

He stayed after hours to help source my delayed item and expedite shipping. It arrived in time for Christmas. Thanks, Manuel!!!

Review.Titre: I recently ordered a refurbished delta…
Review.Contenu: I recently ordered a refurbished delta 1300 ecoflow generator from wellbots, I received in a defective unit twice.However despite the obvious frustration of that experience I can say that Manuel with wellbots was very patient with me and stood behind me as we worked through getting a properly functioning unit.. I can certainly say that without him I would have canceled and given up..despite the delay I’m well pleased with this product and Manuel deserves a medal for customer service.

Review.Titre: The equipment and app are excellent
Review.Contenu: The equipment and app are excellent and well designed. My only struggle was attempting to adjust the bolt length. It is not as simple as push and turn. The install video is too quick and difficult to see details on a phone.Your biggest problems may be the existing door you are fitting. I had to file and sand an enlarged bolt hole. Your door fit to frame is key too. Can you turn your existing deadbolt without pushing your door snug? If not autolock won't work. New doors, newer construction probably easier than this old house. Happy now that it is in and programmed (easy app, multiple user friendly)

I did opt for the standard free shipping but it was 5 days from ordering until my order shipped. If you are a tech gadget person Wellbots should be on your favorites list!

Review.Titre: We have a "Barker"
Review.Contenu: We have a "Barker".  And when I say "Barker", I mean he forgets his name, or any commands he has learned.  He is a mixture of American Lab & Great Pyrenees, with a thick fur neck.  We tried regular Bark Collars, but unless you have it cinched up to just before choking, he never felt it.With this collar, we have only needed to use the vibrate, and a verbal command, which brings him up short.  Wish we didn't have to charge the collar every third day, the remote holds the charge for a month.  Of course we have a long way to go, but at least he isn't annoying our neighbors, and my husband  :)Thank you Again,Terry-Ann Pesselt

Review.Titre: This is my first time buy from…

Review.Contenu: Bought a Roomba i7 and love it. Ordering was easy and offered at a good price. Shipping took a little longer than I expected, but then again, it was during the Christmas season. Overall, great experience at Wellbots!

Review.Contenu: It's nice to have accessories for all three of our cleaning robots in one place.  Sometimes they don't have what I'm looking for, but when they do, the prices are comparable and the shipping is pretty fast.

Review.Titre: Wellbots worked with me to fix a frustrating situation
Review.Contenu: After my original review, a representative from Wellbots got in touch with me, apologized for the situation, and worked with me to remedy it. At this point, I would happily order from them again in the future.------Original review:-------------I placed an order on a Sunday and attempted to cancel on Monday before the order had shipped. I first tried by phone, but was never able to get through, so I requested cancellation via the contact form on their website. I did not receive a response until Wednesday, at which point they told me it could not be cancelled because it had already shipped. Then on Thursday I received a notification email saying that my order had just been shipped. When I asked for them to cover return shipping costs since I had asked for the order to be cancelled before it was actually shipped, they declined and informed me that I would need to pay $30 if I chose to return my order.

Review.Titre: It took a while, but it turned out okay.

What do you want me to do?"And I asked 4 times about cancelling my order. Im pretty sure all these positive reviews are paid for. Review.Titre: I am so very grateful for your time.
Review.Contenu: Dear Mr Hugo F,I am writing this letter as a note of appreciation for the outstanding customer service provided by you one day ago on the 28th of November 2023. Thank you for taking the time to talk with me. I sincerely appreciate the time you spent reviewing my manufacturers warranty problem.The ability to provide resolution so quickly exceeded my expectations.  Great service makes your customers feel that you care about developing a long-term relationship that means more than just making a sale. I just wanted to express my deep gratitude for the dedicated work you do day after day.Thank you for your assistance with this matter. I highly recommend Wellbots to anyone interested in great products, prices and excellent customer service.Best regards,B. Clark

Review.Titre: Wellbots = Great customer support on cool/useful products, at excellent prices
Review.Contenu: The first time I purchased from Wellbots, I looked at a lot of reviews, to see if I could trust this as-yet unknown business. The reviews were so good as compared to other sites I was looking at, that I chose Wellbots over another site which promised an even lower price.(Too low, if you know what I mean. And Wellbots definitely has competitive prices; I don’t want to give the wrong impression about that.)After a few positive purchase experiences with Wellbots, including several truly exceptional customer service experiences, I want to give back on behalf of other folks wondering if they can trust Wellbots. The answer is a resounding yes!! They are the real deal. And they go the extra mile to support their customers.Seriously — if you’re choosing between Wellbots and some other place to make a purchase, choose Wellbots. There aren’t that many competitors that match their customer service, let alone at the competitive prices they offer.

Review.Titre: I had a problem with one of the EcoFlow…
Review.Contenu: I had a problem with one of the EcoFlow solar generator smart extra battery I purchased from Wellbots.  After many emails and attempts to get EcoFlow to resolve the problem, I reached out to Greg at Wellbots.  He was very responsive and helpful in this matter.  EcoFlow wanted me to accept a refurbished smart battery which I believe was not acceptable.  In the end of this ordeal, Wellbots sent me a NEW smart extra battery to replace the defective one!I have ordered 3 separate solar batteries from Wellbots and will probably order more at some point in time.Wellbotts was very respectful and went above and beyond to make sure that I was satisfied and fairly treated.  I do recommend this company highly and feel you will not be disappointed!

Review.Titre: GREAT SERVICE
Review.Contenu: Needed help on a order and Andy was promp and very courteous.  Pinball speaks highly about the company and I can see why. They have helped change several people's lives with donations. We'll definitely be back adding to our off grid system. Thanks

Review.Titre: first time purchasing from this company…
Review.Contenu: first time purchasing from this company more than I expected. fast shipping and great customer service. I will be buying from them again and referring to any anyone.

Review.Titre: Delta 2 and the extra battery
Review.Contenu: I ordered the Delta 2 and the extra battery bundle. The order shipped via FedEx and required a signature which I liked because I knew when it was delivered and it wasn’t just left on my porch.The extra battery arrived before the Delta 2 but only by a couple of days.So far I’m extremely pleased with the unit, it came with 29% charge and I got it hooked up and charged in under 45 minutes.I went back on to the website and ordered the solid solar panels. Those should arrive this week.I wanted to have multiple ways of charging the generator in case the power goes off for more than a day.I had several questions about necessary cables to hook the panels to the unit and someone got back to me quickly and provided the necessary information. The team at Wellbots is very helpful and they provide excellent customer service!I would definitely recommend Wellbots and their solar generators and extra batteries.

Review.Titre: I ordered the ecoflow Delta 2 max
Review.Contenu: I ordered the ecoflow Delta 2 max with solar panels. I think wellbots had a very good price for the package. It shipped FedEx and FedEx made mistakes in the first delivery of the power station. Stan at wellbots worked diligently to get another one sent out to me. It arrived today and I charged it right up. I would definitely buy from wellbots again and recommend it to others.

Review.Titre: I recently ordered an Ecoflow Delta…
Review.Contenu: I recently ordered an Ecoflow Delta 1300 but apparently clicked on the Delta 1000.  After receiving the 1000 I reached out to Welbots (Greg) and explained my dilemma.  Greg immediately sent a return shipping label.  Not only did he get the Delta 1300 on its way but since the 1300+220 was currently on sale at $120 less than I paid he got me a $120 refund.  Kudos to Welbots (namely Greg) for the “above & beyond” effort put in.  To the person that recently wrote “poor customer service” all I can say is some people can’t be satisfied.

Review.Titre: Great customer service! Recently bought two bundles EcoFlow…
Review.Contenu: Recently bought two bundles EcoFlow Delta Pro from Wellbots. One of the Delta Pro main screen could not turn on. I contacted Wellbots customer service. They are fantastic fast responding and replacing a new one for me. Thank you very much!

Review.Titre: UPDATE of Poor Customer Service
Review.Contenu: This is an update of my Wellbots review dated Oct 3, 2023. I received a call from Wellbots apologizing for the confusion of my order delays within customer service. Though the product I ordered is no longer available I did promptly receive a refund. Their extended kindness and help with any future orders were well received. Mistakes happen and because they followed up with me, I anticipate doing business again.

Review.Titre: Twice Done Right!
Review.Contenu: David contacted me after I explained in chat that I had canceled an order because I had missed the Labor Day sale cutoff. He offered a discount which we accepted and completed the order by phone. This all took less than 10 minutes. His timely help reminded me of the wonderful service we received on an earlier order with Wellbots when a product arrived with parts moving in a sealed box could be heard. Return and replacement actions were handled promptly!

Review.Titre: Good solid company with good products
Review.Contenu: Good solid company with good products. I got a good deal on an EcoFlow power supply with 160W solar panel. Everything arrived quickly and in good condition. Nothing went wrong so I can’t say much about their customer service.  Getting it right the first time is what we all want so 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Customer service experience with Kartik from Wellbots
Review.Contenu: It is all about customer service for me. Kartik from Wellbots has been working with me hand-in-hand dealing with issues I am having with my control panel for my dolphin robot. He has gone above and beyond "the call of duty". So very much appreciative of everything he is doing to help resolve. Communication with Kartik is the best. He answers my emails and my telephone calls. He follows through with exactly what he says he will do. THANKYOU Kartik for everything!!Janice

Review.Titre: Excellent Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I bought a scooter for my son 2 years ago and needed a receipt to share with scooter company. I sent an email late Sunday evening and received a response with the receipt first thing in the morning! This was extremely professional to respond so quickly so that I can take care of getting the scooter repaired quicker thanks to their speediness!!! 10 out 10 on customer service!

Review.Titre: Great company all around
Review.Contenu: Great product, great price, and great service.  We purchased an air purifier and received it quickly.  The air purifier works great.  Wellbots goes above and beyond.  Each time we purchase something, we get a follow up email to see if there are any issues.  We've never had an issue, but the email is nice.

Review.Titre: They had what I needed and would ship where I needed it…
Review.Contenu: They answered all my questions promptly, answered all my questions about shipping to Alaska, they run their business the way all businesses should be run.

Review.Titre: Noah helped me with a firmware update…
Review.Contenu: Noah helped me with a firmware update as well as me placing a new additional order to expand my delta pro capacity.  He was very patient and honest during the process. I own a small investigative business and know the importance of quality people. I feel that he was helpful and dedicated to both wellbots and ecoflow.

Review.Titre: Great price on the Delta EcoPro
Review.Contenu: Great price on the Delta EcoPro! Fast free shipping. Arrived in perfect condition. It is charged and ready to go. When I'm purchase the extra battery and solar panels, I'll definitely go with Wellbots!A special thanks to Hugo F. for assistance!

Review.Titre: Best price, fast service
Review.Contenu: Learned of Elliot and Wellbots through Pinball Preparedness Y.T. channel.  Evaluated my needs, and decided on a Delta Pro, plus an extra smart battery to extend its use.  Website is easy to navigate & use, email & chat help are available, if needed.  Best price I could find on internet hands down.  Arrived in 3 days, despite holiday & bad weather!  Great job guys!  Now I can substantially extend my off-grid time without a gas generator running.

Review.Titre: Had an Ecoflow Extra Battery product…
Review.Contenu: Had an Ecoflow Extra Battery product that failed after one week. Wellbots' support group (shout out to Hugo) was very responsive and worked closely with me to get the matter resolved with a new unit. Great customer support! Will definitely buy from them again.

Review.Titre: Had a little issue with one product…
Review.Contenu: Had a little issue with one product missing a cable (No fault to Wellbots).Wellbots was on top of everything each step of the way. The communication that Stan at Wellbots provided was like no other out there, period!!!! He made sure I knew what was going on, what the vendor was doing, when it was shipped, cared enough to reach out and made sure I had it (which in didn’t at that time) got back to me after that to tell me what was going on. I have never experienced anything like this. I absolutely had NO worries. Anything I was worried about he answered even before I was worried about it. I can’t say enough about how perfect this transaction went.I will definitely recommend this company to anyone and everyone who is interested in any products Wellbots has.Top notch customer service

Review.Titre: Hey WELLBOTS!!..Great Job! Fast shipping, properly packaging!!
Review.Contenu: I am so very appreciative that I happened to discover WELLBOTS in my constant searches for a solar generator..years ago I first encountered the solar generation of reliable of grid power...so many brands...but I always review the reviews!! And Wellbots allowed me to fulfill my vision with ECOFLOW at a tremendous price! Although the product is amazing, what puts it over the top is the Vendor...Wellbots...you can always tell when you are dealing with a fantastic supplier with their "After Sales Support"

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: Great customer service. Very happy with my purchase.

Review.Titre: Wellbots has the best price for Ecoflow Delta Pro Smart Battery
Review.Contenu: Wellbots has the best price for the Ecoflow Delta Pro Smart Battery and they were quick to ship out the battery from a warehouse. When FedEx put the battery in a truck back to the warehouse due to miscommunication I had with FedEx, Wellbots quickly shipped out another battery when I reached out to customer support.  Customer support was great to work with. The battery is working great.

Review.Titre: Love this brand
Review.Contenu: Love this brand! Have made multiple expensive & large (size) orders w/ them already & shipping was always on time + customer service in touch

Review.Titre: Wow, great experience
Review.Contenu: Wow, I am truly pleased with my purchase from the beginning of the order to the actual delivery of the product. I pleased my order with Noah on Monday July 31st. Noah was knowledgeable about the product and very professional. Two days later my dolphin cc plusPool cleaner was delivered to my house. Thank you Wellbots for being true to your word in providing quality products at a fair price. Clayton Powder

Review.Titre: Ecoflow Delta 1300 and 160 watt portable solar panel.
Review.Contenu: I have bought two separate systems from Wellbots that integrate. My first was a Ecoflow Delta 1300 Solar Generator. I am more than pleased with the performance, It charged exactly as advertised, from 30% upon delivery to 100% in an hour. All aspects of the generator work perfectly. Just received a 160 watt portable solar panel. Will be charging the generator later on today. I expect the same quality and performance. Both items arrived in a matter of days. I compliment Wellbots associate, Noah, for making the sales enjoyable and non complicated. Noah is very personable and knowledgeable about the solar items I have purchased. No hard sell or pressure. Any minor questions I had after the sales were addressed by email within 12 hours. Customer service is top notch  I shall be adding to another solar system I already have. I am sure the Wellbots parts will fit seamlessly. This has been a solid experience.

Review.Titre: Pesky receipts for 2022 tax prep
Review.Contenu: I needed some receipts for 2022 Wellbots purchases of solar equipment for tax purposes.  Wellbots prices on that sort of tech are usually among the best.  Anyway, about those receipts.  I called customer service and reached Solene.  She handled the request quickly and courteously and I had PDFs of all my 2022 Wellbots transactions in about 10 minutes.  That made life just a bit easier and Wellbots look very customer oriented.  Thanks Solene!

Review.Titre: Placed an order with Wellbots for solar equipment
Review.Contenu: Placed an order with Wellbots for solar equipment. Customer service explained what I needed and quoted me prices much less than any other vender.  Only problem I had was items were shipped from different warehouses.  A mixup occurred with the delivery. I called customer service and spoke with Solene.  Problem was resolved in a short time. Very happy with my purchase and the support I received. I recommend this company very highly.

Review.Titre: Solene made for easy replacement
Review.Contenu: I initially made an order but realized I made a mistake. I tried calling to change the order but no one answered and I got worried. Called another day and got a hold of Solene. She was extremely helpful and got my order turned around by FedEx and then sent out the system I needed and refunded my the difference in price. It did take a while but as a small business it’s understandable. We are all so used to big online stores that we forget that things take time. Solene was very responsive to my emails once we got connected.

Review.Titre: Wellbots resolved my issue seamlessly
Review.Contenu: There were two issues with the product I purchased through Wellbots that had nothing to do with the company. Even so, they stood behind the product and got both issues resolved to my complete satisfaction.  Business is easy for a company when everything goes perfectly it's only when things go sideways do you find out how a business truly handles their business. I recommend Wellbots

Review.Titre: Wondrerfu products and service
Review.Contenu: I had a problem with my order and realized I needed help to resolve it.  I tried emails with the support team at Wellbots. After several attempts  back and forth due to my inept use of email I called today. I was so frustrated with my lack of email skills.  I had email interactions with Greg and another support team member. Both were trying to help me and were very kind and professional. When I called I spoke with a real person, Hugo. He assured me that both the previous team members were real people. I explained my issue and he was so very patient, kind and professional.  He offered options for me to resolve my problem and we came to a very agreeable resolution.  I am so very impressed with the products I have ordered from Wellbots and am more than satisfied with the service I have received.  I can't recommend them enough. I am now looking forward to my next Wellbots purchase.

Review.Titre: Great products and excellent Customer…
Review.Contenu: Great products and excellent Customer Service!! I have had a couple of purchases with them, one went perfectly and the other(due to being a prize giveaway) had a hiccup, but the service I have received from Stan in Customer Service has been beyond my expectations!! Really appreciate their quality of product and service!!

Review.Titre: Extremely impressed
Review.Contenu: Really happy I made my purchase with this company; I placed an order for an expensive appliance and discovered that I could have saved over $100 more with a coupon code I discovered after I ordered. I felt they really understood my position as a consumer and still honored a discount for me after I ordered. This is something that is getting increasingly rare these days and gives me peace of mind to spend more money there in the future.

Review.Titre: Loose Part
Review.Contenu: I got response from Chloe at Wellbots support within 12 hours guiding me through return of a Ecoflow product that arrived at our home with a loose part inside of it. Chloe handled everything promptly and efficiently as our advocate. The replacement unit is scheduled to arrive tomorrow, 5/27/2023.

Review.Titre: Great Company and Associates
Review.Contenu: Bought a part for my solar system and it ended up being about a 4 month wait due to some issues. While it was longer to get than expected, Bryan from Wellbots did an outstanding job keeping me posted monthly with current information and ETA’s. Very professional and trustworthy!

Review.Titre: Love these guys
Review.Contenu: Love these guys. They offer great products, especially for the times we are in. The generators are various varieties based on your needs. Delivery was quick and packaged properly. Have not had to use customer service but have no reason to believe it wouldn’t be top notch as well. I got the 1300w and am fighting myself over an electric bike as I’m 63 and peddling isn’t so easy anymore.😂

Review.Titre: Garmin Delta Pro XC
Review.Contenu: The product ordered, and received were exactly the same, and what I wanted. The price was appropriate; no one works for free.Wellbots promptly confirmed my order, it was shipped swiftly, and received in a few days. The item was packaged appropriately, and arrived in new condition. My item was new, factory packaged, and functions exactly as expected.

Review.Titre: Great products at fabulous prices and…
Review.Contenu: Great products at fabulous prices and You helping Pinball get the ecoflow generators or the knowledge about them out to the people like me.Plus fedex has a new delivery policy which is a lot better than before about seeing an ID and having a signature at the time of delivery. Thanks

Review.Titre: Best Customer Service
Review.Contenu: This was my first time ordering so I was nervous. I had an insanely unique issue come up that was far past the return window.  After the root cause of my issue was identified they corrected it quickly and above satisfactory! I will def order from this company again.

Review.Titre: Great Price, Exceptional Service!
Review.Contenu: Ordered from Wellbots because they had a better price over some competitors.  Had a slight issue with one of our scooters and couldn't be happier with how it was handled.  Chloe from customer service was a rockstar!   She was very communicative and went above and beyond to answer my numerous questions.  Absolutely recommend to anyone!

Review.Titre: Overall good experience
Review.Contenu: They said the items were in stock. I was a little nervous when I received no confirmation of shipping updates etc. I had to chat with customer service to get information, including tracking #s. When their customer service said they'd get back to me they didn't so I had to chat with customer service again.  Customer service was very helpful. Overall, pretty good service during the Holiday rush. The product was delivered as described.

Review.Titre: Product as described and on time
Review.Contenu: This summer, we put in an above ground pool and needed a robot vacuum to help with the leaves.  The product came quickly and intact.  Plus, it came with a fine filter basket instead of a regular basket, as promised, and it cost the same as others wanted for a vacuum with regular basket.

Review.Titre: Had an issue and they resolved quickly once I contacted them.
Review.Contenu: I love wellbots but unfortunately the dolphin caddy was not what expected and was reboxed with a product that had been glued together and returned.Updated: After contacting them they replied and researched everything. I sent them pictures and they gladly shipped me a new one with 2 days I had it. I have changed my rating as they were very fast in getting this fixed.

Review.Titre: Overall I have been dealing with a Power Supply that did not work properly out of the box.
Review.Contenu: Overall I have been dealing with a frustrating situation.  The piece of equipment that was sold to me works, but some of the lights to indicate the settings we chose does not work.  Wellbots has been wonderful to me and working on my behalf to deal with the manufacturer.  They respond to me quickly and share in my frustration with the manufacturer.

Review.Titre: Great prices! Great Service
Review.Contenu: Found Wellbots after watching a YouTube review of a product I wanted and the person recommended them.  Turns out they had a special deal going and I saved over a $100 off the manufactures special deal at the time.  Shipping was fast and product was in great shape.  I will be shopping with them again soon.

Review.Titre: I bought an EcoFlow Delta 2 with an expandible battery.
Review.Contenu: I bought an EcoFlow Delta 2 with an expandable battery.  While I was on this site, I requested an online chat with a customer service rep.  I asked about a solar cable and he was kind enough to include it for free.  Everything arrived just fine but I wasn't specific enough about which solar cable I wanted.  I emailed Wellbots and they sent me the other cable as well FOR FREE!!  Great product and even better customer service.  Wellbots went above and beyond what they needed to do.  I highly recommend using them and will use them again.

Review.Titre: My first time shopping with Wellbots…
Review.Contenu: My first time shopping with Wellbots and I will say they have outstanding customer service. I was extremely impressed with the quick responses and resolutions when I contacted the customer service department. My order was shipped in a timely manner & packaged well. I will say quite happy. Thank you Solene in customer service!

Review.Titre: Good deal - Good products
Review.Contenu: The savings on the total package with solar panel included was what made us make the purchase.  Received in good condition within a week.

Review.Titre: I ordered for Christmas a Jackery…
Review.Contenu: I ordered for Christmas a Jackery Explorer 1000. I was afraid of the shipment as it's a heavy and fragile object but what can i say other than that the delivery was in advance and the packaging was perfect. My first order on Wellbots and certainly not my last! Keep up the good work guys!

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service
Review.Contenu: Excellent customer service. Follow up on anything you request. Always checking that I’m satisfied with the answers they send me also. Just good people here.

Review.Titre: My mistake was their pleasure to fix.
Review.Contenu: Very good communication and Chloe was exceptionally helpful when I made a mistake on my order. It took a few days, but she came through and got everything taken care of. I couldn’t ask for more courteous service.

Review.Titre: Helpful and honest
Review.Contenu: Great experience with Wellbots. I was unsure how many solar panels I would need for what I was trying to protect if we loose power. They showed me how to calculate charge time. I only needed one more. They are very helpful and honest. I really appreciate that in a business.

Review.Titre: Good value plus
Review.Contenu: Good value.Professional web page layout without the glitz.Good after sale followup on the order confirmation, shipping and delivery.First time Wellbots user, expect to purchase from them again.

Review.Titre: Communication is very good
Review.Contenu: Communication is very good. Best prices anywhere. Shipping was fast. We will return for our needs. A trusted business.

Review.Titre: We had a little issue with a bike that…
Review.Contenu: We had a little issue with a bike that we bought from Wellbots. Their team was super helpful (especially, Chloe) in getting the issue resolved. My son now has a motorized bike he loves to ride!!

Review.Titre: Got the River pro bundle
Review.Contenu: Got the River pro bundle, pro & solar panel showed up fast 2 days, extra battery should show up by Friday I emailed to question where’s the battery, they replied quickly and answered my question, I will be a return customer.

Review.Titre: We are very happy to make the purchase on wellbots.com.
Review.Contenu: We are very happy to make the purchase on wellbots.com. It is very easy to navigation around on wellbots website. Items were shipped promptly and delivered as scheduled. We are very satisfied with the our order.

Review.Titre: Purchased a Segway GT1 scooter from…
Review.Contenu: Purchased a Segway GT1 scooter from Wellbots.  Order placed Tuesday night and was in my driveway by Friday morning.  Very fast shipping and best price of any Segway retailer.

Review.Titre: I purchased a SwellPro Splash 4 drone…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a SwellPro Splash 4 drone through Wellbots.  I had problems with the drone.  SwellPro was not very helpful implying the problems were either my fault or "part of the fun".  Wellbots jumped in and helped me resolve the issues.  They stayed with me through the whole situation.Had I purchased my drone through someone else I am sure my experience would have been less agreeable.

Review.Titre: Wellbots staff has always excelled
Review.Contenu: Wellbots staff has always been very supportive of their customers.  I have had a couple f situations that they have taken care of promptly and efficiently for me and I am very appreciative of them

Review.Titre: Nice web page and service
Review.Contenu: Nice web page - easy to find and purchase item - prompt delivery by FEDEX and item arrived in pristine condition.

Review.Titre: Great shopping experience
Review.Contenu: I got my order as expected and everything worked out great for my first purchase with Wellbots. I got a great deal on a big battery and I'll definitely be more confident making future purchases.

Review.Titre: Great experience
Review.Contenu: Storefront easy to navigate, great support, great sale prices.  Order arrived fast no issues at all!

Review.Titre: Reputable Company with Great Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I appreciate a reputable company with excellent rating and good customer service. I saw the item at a lower price at other websites but was unsure about the company.  I received email updates as to my order and was sent a tracking information. I was offered a discount on a related item but when I finally decided to purchase it, the offer was gone. I contact customer service and they extended the same offer to me.

Review.Titre: Your people are great
Review.Contenu: Your people are great! They know the products, and they have good communication skills. Also, unlike the major brands, the communication links are clear and the language skills of your representatives are far better than others.

Review.Titre: Very good shopping experience!!
Review.Contenu: My order was at a great price for the item and shipped in a timely manner. I had to speak to customer service for a minor mishap(no blame to be placed on anyone) and the issue was resolved quickly and one of the best interactions I have with a purchase. Thank you!

Review.Titre: I could not be happier.My order was quickly…
Review.Contenu: I could not be happier. My order was quickly processed and shipped, and every step of the way i got emails to give me a heads up when my item was going to arrive.Also i could not find a lower price anywhere not even the manufacture could beat Wllbots price.

Review.Titre: Great experience, service and product
Review.Contenu: East order process, timely delivery and best of all we received a QUALITY bot for cleaning our pool.  We'll definitely use Wellbots in the future

Review.Titre: Great addition to the Delta 2
Review.Contenu: Great addition to the Delta 2, one upgrade should include a couple of zippered pockets to keep things together when transporting. Fits very well and the construction is top notch.

Review.Titre: Smooth and A+ shopping experience!
Review.Contenu: The entire process was smooth.. I ended up placing this order through your company after Amazon and their 3rd party failed big time… thanks to you guys I will have my Son’s Christmas present on time! I will definitely continue to order items from you guys!

Review.Titre: Great Company and customer service
Review.Contenu: The site and buying process was easy. There was even a price drop after I purchased the product and they refunded the difference within an hour of my email. Quality service and products! I would highly recommend them and will be using them again in the future.

Review.Titre: I was looking for a backup power supply…
Review.Contenu: I was looking for a backup power supply to run electronics during a power outage and having the ability to have a portable power system. I was referred to Wellbots by a prepping channel on YouTube as he does product reviews (along with give aways) and it had the products that I always wanted to get. Before placing the order, I talked to Wellbots via the chat channel to get some information that wasn't mentioned in the product page, and they gave me the answers to my questions. Unlike other places where they pressure you into buying the items Wellbots didn't give me any sort of pressure - just the answers to the questions which I'm glad. I look forward doing business with Wellbots in the future.

Review.Titre: Customer service went above and beyond
Review.Contenu: This was my first time ordering from Wellbots. I had a little bit of initial confusion with the tracking number for my order. When I reached out to Wellbots customer service, they went above and beyond my expectations to make it right. This is the kind of organization I appreciate doing business with. Thank you, Wellbots!

Review.Titre: First purchase (E-Bike) and amazed how…Customer Service
Review.Contenu: First purchase (E-Bike) and amazed how fast this came. 5 days from ordering.The seat was defected. I sent some pictures and called. This involved the store contacting the manufacture for the problem. Who in return will be sending me a new seat. The issue was resolved right away. Can you believe I got someone on the phone who really cares. That to me is rare.

Review.Titre: Customer support and response time was…
Review.Contenu: Customer support and response time was great

Review.Titre: My Grandson loves his dirt bike!
Review.Contenu: My Grandson loves his dirt bike!  We got it for his birthday , he was surprised to say the least!Your customer service is amazing and the shipping department Wow what can I say we got our order in plenty of time to surprise himThe bike is the exactly the way he wanted it, the quality is amazing    Thank you

Review.Titre: I highly recommend Wellbots
Review.Contenu: I highly recommend Wellbots. They went out of their way to quickly process an order I made so that my child could enjoy their present at Christmas. Much appreciated!

Review.Titre: Great customer service!!
Review.Contenu: Great customer service!!Had an issue with my order and I contacted their customer service and to my surprise they answered in just minutes! I told them there was an item missing that was ordered and right away they shipped the missing cable.

Review.Titre: I bought the Neabot pet grooming kit…
Review.Contenu: I bought the Neabot pet grooming kit and now I wonder why I waited so long! This thing is amazing! I literally cut my dog grooming time in half! I came well packaged, and early then estimated. I couldn't wait to get started and used it that evening. My little pup was initially startled by the noise but quickly got used to it. It cut her hair quickly and efficiently. If you're on the fence about this product, buy it!

Review.Titre: The device works in 220V through a converter!
Review.Contenu: I'm from Ukraine. I ordered the device because in my country the Russian Federation is attacking power plants! This 120V device also works at 220V through a V converter. Thanks to the store for the device! This device is cheaper than the European one! God bless America! :-)

Review.Titre: Very Pleased
Review.Contenu: We called the company a couple of times before placing our order. An actual person answered the phone with no prompts to press to get a live person. They answered all of our questions that we had except one. He told us to send an email and we would get a response in 30 or so. About 20 minutes later, a tech person responded to the email with the answers. And we hadn't even ordered yet! Once we placed the order, it was shipped and delivered as promised. The packaging was secure and sturdy. We have been using our Delta 2 and extra battery for a couple of weeks now and it has lived up to all expectations. Very pleased with this company and product all the way around.

Review.Titre: I made two separate purchases
Review.Contenu: I made two separate purchases. I order an Ecoflow Delta 2 and a second battery. Quick delivery and one of the lowest prices out there. I would recommend Wellbots to anyone.

Review.Titre: Nuratrue pro
Review.Contenu: Even though I was impatient and rude in my email to them, they were professional and courteous in theirs. Thank you for calling me and giving me an opportunity too explain my situation.

Review.Titre: We’ll definitely be returning…
Review.Contenu: We’ll definitely be returning customers!!! Staff is so helpful in ordering and helpful getting a purchase expedited so that it will arrive by Christmas!!! Communication was great every step of the way. Much better prices and service compared to Amazon!

Review.Titre: I ordered two Ecoflow Delta Max solar…
Review.Contenu: I ordered two Ecoflow Delta Max solar generators from Wellbots and received quick delivery without damage to the boxs. It would be great if you could offer steep discounts on different brands of solar generators and their accessories that you stock / carry on certain days of the month.

Review.Titre: Good Company & Timely Shipping
Review.Contenu: My previous review was incorrect. I was thinking of the wrong company when I wrote the review. I changed the review from 3 stars to 5 stars. The product was delivered as ordered and within the estimated shipping period.

Review.Titre: Great Staff, excellent experience!
Review.Contenu: The staff (Solene) at Wellbots are top notch. I was having technical issues with my order and couldn't get it placed during a sale they had. I reached out to their crew and they got me squared away within 24 hours! Can't thank them enough.

Review.Titre: Good customer service
Review.Contenu: Good customer service, they even called me to quickly resolve an error on their end.  Really fast shipping. only took 2 days for a dirt bike!

Review.Titre: Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I did a chat with Clark to check on the status of our order. He was professional and responsive. He was very helpful. Wellbots customer service is very nice to work with.

Review.Titre: Research showed this company to be…
Review.Contenu: Research showed this company to be reputable.  Deal offered was very good.  Will evaluate when I receive the product .  Customer service is always important.

Review.Titre: I placed an order for wrong color of…
Review.Contenu: I placed an order for wrong color of ear phones and created a ticket with the support. The customer team (Chloe) was quick to address my concern and placed a new order for me.

Review.Titre: The experience was easy and seamless
Review.Contenu: The experience was easy and seamless. I had a question and so I called Wellbots on their 646 phone number. The lady was very nice, clear, answered all my questions. I placed the order and it shows I will get it tomorrow. 5 stars, well deserved. Will order again soon. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Fair pricing, Quick Delivery
Review.Contenu: Fair pricing.  Quick delivery.  Had doubts about purchasing a high priced item on line, but this purchase was excellent!!!

Review.Titre: Excellent, Responsible Customer Service
Review.Contenu: In my opinion, the true test of quality customer service is not a matter of everything going right (encountering no problems or issues) but how you are treated when something goes wrong.On more than one occasion when I have had a serious product issue, Wellbots has been responsive and taken a responsible course of action advocating on my behalf to the manufacturer. Many may have the ability to sell you a product but few stand behind the products they offer and their customer.
